name: Ed Anuff
bio: Ed Anuff is a visionary technology leader and entrepreneur, currently leading IBM's open core agentic AI product strategy. He was previously Chief Product Officer at DataStax, which was acquired by IBM in 2025. With over 30 years of experience, he has shaped industry-defining products—from launching one of the first Internet search engines at Wired, founding enterprise portal pioneer Epicentric, and guiding Apigee through its IPO and acquisition by Google. His innovative approach to product strategy has made him a driving force in the evolution of data, APIs, and enterprise platforms.
